title.rendered: Quetta vs Karachi, Pakistan T20 League 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Quetta: Yasir Khan, Will Smeed/Martin Guptill, Sarfaraz Ahmed (c & wk), Mohammad Nawaz, Iftikhar Ahmed, Najibullah Zadran, Umar Akmal, Odean Smith, Umaid Asif, Naseem Shah, Naveen-ul-Haq

Karachi: Sharjeel Khan, Adam Rossington (wk), Tayyab Tahir, Shoaib Malik, Imad Wasim (c), Irfan Khan, Matthew Wade, Aamer Yamin, Mohammad Amir, Andrew Tye, Tabraiz Shamsi

Venue: Pindi Club Ground, Rawalpindi

Pitch Report

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 192

2nd innings average score: 190

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Good for batting

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

For six games in a row, Imad Wasim has been a part of the Best11. He has been dismissed only twice this season, including the top scores 92* and 57* at Rawalpindi.

Iftikhar Ahmed loves batting against Karachi. He averages a whopping 87, including the highest score of 71*.

Besides inflicting 15 dismissals, Sarfaraz Ahmed has collected 231 runs at 46 versus Karachi.

Mohammad Amir has taken only five wickets in 10 matches against Quetta but has gone wicketless only once in his last 10 outings, including the best figures of four for 26 at Rawalpindi.

Despite being shuffled in the batting order, Matthew Wade has collected 224 runs at 32 including the highest score 53 at the Pindi Club a few days ago.

Naseem Shah has been equally effective with the new and old ball. His best ever figures (five for 20) in the league has come against Karachi.

When these teams locked horns earlier in the competition, Martin Guptill (117) and Shoaib Malik (71) were the captain and the vice-captain of the Best11 respectively.

Mohammad Nawaz doesn’t have great numbers against Karachi. He has merely added 52 runs and taken eight wickets in 13 matches.
